languages.text: "Впрочем, Иремерисс никогда не нравилось подчиненное положение кабала. Ее слова, а порой и поступки, направленные против Черного сердца, вызывали у ее слуг шепотки недовольства и страха. Я не собирался отказываться от протекции кабала самого Асдрубаэля Векта — если бы мне удалось сбросить Иремерисс с помощью Назракея, я бы нашел поддержку".

"Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, Иремерисс никогда не нравилось подчиненное положение кабала. Ее слова, а порой и поступки, направленные против Черного сердца, вызывали у ее слуг шепотки недовольства и страха. languages.text: «A Yremeryss nunca le ha gustado la posición subordinada de la Kábala. Sus palabras y ocasionalmente acciones en contra del Corazón Negro sembraban murmullos de insatisfacción y miedo entre quienes la sirven. Yo no estaba dispuesto a renunciar a la protección de la Kábala del propio Asdrubael Vect. Si hubiera logrado derrocar a Yremeryss con la ayuda de Nazrakhei, muchos en la Tempestad Asoladora habrían apoyado mis acciones».
languages.original_text: "Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

traits.locale_text: «A Yremeryss nunca le ha gustado la posición subordinada de la Kábala. Sus palabras y ocasionalmente acciones en contra del Corazón Negro sembraban murmullos de insatisfacción y miedo entre quienes la sirven. Yo no estaba dispuesto a renunciar a la protección de la Kábala del propio Asdrubael Vect. Si hubiera logrado derrocar a Yremeryss con la ayuda de Nazrakhei, muchos en la Tempestad Asoladora habrían apoyado mis acciones».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “伊芮梅莉斯一直不喜欢听命于人。她针对黑心阴谋团的言论与行动，让那些臣服于她的人背地里产生了不满和恐惧，而我并不打算摒弃阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特的阴谋团的保护。如果我当时在纳札骸的帮助下，成功地推翻了伊芮梅莉斯，那么狂风阴谋团的很多人都会支持我。”
languages.original_text: "Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

traits.locale_text: “伊芮梅莉斯一直不喜欢听命于人。她针对黑心阴谋团的言论与行动，让那些臣服于她的人背地里产生了不满和恐惧，而我并不打算摒弃阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特的阴谋团的保护。如果我当时在纳札骸的帮助下，成功地推翻了伊芮梅莉斯，那么狂风阴谋团的很多人都会支持我。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「イレメリスは、陰謀団の従属的な立場を決して良くは思っていなかった。黒き心臓に向けられたその言葉、そして、時にはその行動が、あいつに仕える者たちの間に不満と恐怖をもたらした。俺はアスドルバエル・ヴェクトの陰謀団による保護を放棄するつもりはなかった…もし、ナズラクヘイの助けを借りてイレメリスを倒すことに成功していたなら、略奪の嵐の多くの者たちは俺を支持しただろう」
languages.original_text: "Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

traits.locale_text: 「イレメリスは、陰謀団の従属的な立場を決して良くは思っていなかった。黒き心臓に向けられたその言葉、そして、時にはその行動が、あいつに仕える者たちの間に不満と恐怖をもたらした。俺はアスドルバエル・ヴェクトの陰謀団による保護を放棄するつもりはなかった…もし、ナズラクヘイの助けを借りてイレメリスを倒すことに成功していたなら、略奪の嵐の多くの者たちは俺を支持しただろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Yremeryss n'a jamais digéré que notre Kabale soit reléguée au rang de subalterne. Son discours et parfois ses actes à l'encontre du Cœur Noir ont semé les graines de la sédition et de la crainte parmi ses serviteurs. Pour ma part, je n'étais pas prêt à renoncer à la protection de la Kabale d'Asdrubael Vect en personne, et si j'avais réussi à renverser ma sœur avec l'aide de Nazrakhei, bon nombre de membres de la Tempête ravageuse m'auraient soutenu dans ma démarche. »
languages.original_text: "Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

traits.locale_text: « Yremeryss n'a jamais digéré que notre Kabale soit reléguée au rang de subalterne. Son discours et parfois ses actes à l'encontre du Cœur Noir ont semé les graines de la sédition et de la crainte parmi ses serviteurs. Pour ma part, je n'étais pas prêt à renoncer à la protection de la Kabale d'Asdrubael Vect en personne, et si j'avais réussi à renverser ma sœur avec l'aide de Nazrakhei, bon nombre de membres de la Tempête ravageuse m'auraient soutenu dans ma démarche. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Yremeryss war schon immer unglücklich über die unterlegene Position der Kabale. Ihre Worte — und manchmal auch ihre Taten — gegen das Schwarze Herz lösten unter ihren Dienern gewispertes Unbehagen aus, Unzufriedenheit, Angst gar. Ich war nicht bereit, den Schutz von Asdrubael Vects eigener Kabale aufzugeben — wäre es mir gelungen, Yremeryss mit Nazrakheis Hilfe zu stürzen, hätten mich viele im plündernden Sturm unterstützt."
languages.original_text: "Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

traits.locale_text: "Yremeryss war schon immer unglücklich über die unterlegene Position der Kabale. Ihre Worte — und manchmal auch ihre Taten — gegen das Schwarze Herz lösten unter ihren Dienern gewispertes Unbehagen aus, Unzufriedenheit, Angst gar. Ich war nicht bereit, den Schutz von Asdrubael Vects eigener Kabale aufzugeben — wäre es mir gelungen, Yremeryss mit Nazrakheis Hilfe zu stürzen, hätten mich viele im plündernden Sturm unterstützt."

languages.original_text: "Yremeryss has never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

languages.text: "Yremeryss ise Kabal'ın bu konumundan hiç memnun değildi. Sözleriyle, kimi zaman da hareketleriyle Kara Yürek'i hedef alışı... Hizmetkârlarınca pek hoş karşılanmadı. Asdrubael Vect'in Kabalı'nın himayesinden çıkmayı ben de uygun bulmuyordum. Nazrakhei'in yardımıyla Yremeryss'i devirebilseydim Müfteris Kasırga içinde bana arka çıkan çok olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Yremeryss never liked the Kabal's subordinate position. Her words, and sometimes her actions, directed against the Black Heart prompted whispers of discontent and fear among those who served her. I was not willing to renounce the protection of Asdrubael Vect's own Kabal — if I had succeeded in overthrowing Yremeryss with Nazrakhei's aid, many within the Reaving Tempest would have supported me."

traits.locale_text: "Yremeryss'se Kabal'ın bu konumundan hiç memnun değildi. Sözleriyle, kimi zaman da hareketleriyle Kara Yürek'i hedef alışı... Hizmetkârlarınca pek hoş karşılanmadı. Asdrubael Vect'in Kabal'ının himayesinden çıkmayı ben de uygun bulmuyordum. Nazrakhei'in yardımıyla Yremeryss'i devirebilseydim Müfteris Kasırga içinde bana arka çıkan çok olurdu."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
